Quality Education.reason: This course equips Ph.D. students with the advanced mathematical tools necessary for rigorous economic modeling and theoretical analysis, and is foundational for advanced coursework in theoretical economics.
evidence: This course equips Ph.D. students with the advanced mathematical tools necessary for rigorous economic modeling and theoretical analysis.
Emphasis is placed on the mathematical structures underlying modern economic theory, including optimization, differential equations, functional analysis, and dynamic systems.
The course prepares students for research in dynamic general equilibrium, game theory, and stochastic control, and is foundational for advanced coursework in theoretical economics.
